name: Alien Hunter (Rio Studios)
description:
Become a human who abducts aliens

Alien Hunter is a game developed for Brakeys Game Jam 2022.1.

➤ Filled with rage and anger, Terry wants to relieve his stress somehow. The spoiled kid decides to steal his father's personal ship and invade nearby planets to abduct any form of life he finds there!

Features
  • Fast-paced arcade gameplay to test your sight and reflexes.  
  • Three different planets filled with detail.
  • Four types of aliens with unique clothing styles.
  • Satisfying and fun soundtrack with a lively atmosphere.
Controls

Alien Hunter was made by Diogo Frazão and Rodrigo Fitas. It is played with a keyboard only.

  • Left and right arrows are used to move the ship around the planet. 
  • The 'Z' key is used to abduct the alien underneath the UFO.
